ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Selo's Song of Travel
ygData.msgSnippet: Given GZ s opinion that Lullaby works and his stated truisms on how it works and their total lack of reflection in the Live game, I am thoroughly unconvinced
ygData.messageBody:
Given GZ's opinion that Lullaby works and his stated truisms on how it works
and their total lack of reflection in the 'Live' game, I am thoroughly
unconvinced anyone at Verant understands bards any better than Gordon. If
the primary spell person is so far out of touch with our spellsongs in the
'Live' environment, who at Verant should we expect to know how they
work?????

Kit

No it is an example of one person not knowing how our class works. Gordon
!= Verant.
